member.name: T:Hack.io.YAZ0.YAZ0
member.summary: Class containing methods to compress and decompress Data into Yaz0

member.name: M:Hack.io.YAZ0.YAZ0.Check(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Checks the data for Yaz0 Encoding
member.param: The stream of data to check
member.returns: TRUE if the stream is Yaz0 encoded

member.name: M:Hack.io.YAZ0.YAZ0.Decompress(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Attempts to decompress the given data as YAZ0.
member.returns: The byte[] of decoded data. Will be the same as the input if it is not YAZ0 encoded

member.name: M:Hack.io.YAZ0.YAZ0.Compress(System.Byte[],System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Encodes the given data as Yaz0.
- Note: Don't double Yaz0 encode data, it doesn't save any space
member.param:
A that will report the percentage complete out of 100.
Set to NULL to disable
If TRUE, will use a different, faster encoding.

member.name: M:Hack.io.YAZ0.YAZ0.Compress(System.Byte[])
member.summary:
Encodes the given data as Yaz0.
Use this if you indent to use (and don't care about strength or progress reporting)
